formattedAddress: 291 Central Park W, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 291 Central Park W, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text:
Choosing Dwight Global is definitely one of the best decisions in my life. I joined Dwight Global when I was turning into a senior. The faculty of Dwight Global cares about every individual student. With a small class size, teachers are able to assist you in every aspect when you need help. Teachers always respond to my questions promptly and provide detailed explanation. What I cherish the most from Dwight Global is not only its rigorous academics, but also the close and warm community that the students and faculty build up altogether. There are multiple engaging and interesting activities held for students and faculty to participate so that we get to meet up with each other!

Dwight Global students are talented and hardworking indeed. They not only pursue their spark of genius but also their academic degree. We work hard and play hard! If time goes back again and again, Dwight Global would definitely be my decision every single time!!

originalText.text: Our son has been in the school for 8 years, and he is now in fourth grade.  We have had an amazing experience at Dwight.  Excellent academic program based on inquiry and research, which enables students to develop strong analytical skills.  Unconditional support on students' creations and innovation ideas.  Access to wonderful teaching methodologies, including most innovative technologies, local and international trips. Unique faculty members with full dedication, who really help kids identify and develop their special abilities. High quality personalized education that results in having very happy and motivated kids.

originalText.text:
Dwight Global is easily a go to school for anyone pursuing their passions. I am constantly on the road pursing my dreams in tennis and the teachers are super flexible, giving extentions on work and staying in contact whenever I need help. The communication is lightning fast and it is easy to tell that the teachers care. Every few days we have interactive online meetings and with the small class size, it is easy to cover tons of information in an extremely interactive fashion.
Dwight global definately offers some of the toughest content you can find online and are very adaptive to your needs, allowing you to take higher level classes if you desire. I love Dwight Global and would recommend it to anyone who is looking to pursue a good schooling as well as their passions and dreams.

originalText.text: This is our first year enrolling in Dwight's Global Online School and we have only positive things to say about their offerings. My son's outside activities demand maximum flexibility in his academic schedule, and the online school is accommodating to his work demands. Furthermore, their coursework is rigorous so strong academics are supported in the virtual environment. His professors have been very attentive and quick to respond to questions. Additionally, the online school offers support through standardized test prep, college counseling, and recent brick and mortar options at the Manhattan campus to include labs and extracurricular events. They strive to meet each family's individual needs.

originalText.text: We moved from Brazil 10 months ago and, simply put, our experience at Dwight has been sensational! Our sons, 6th and 4th graders, felt welcomed, valued and inspired since the very first day. As a new family we couldn't have been more warmly received, we all made new friends and our 4 years old daughter is moving to ECD next September. The philosophy of nurturing each student's spark of genius is real and we could never imagine our sons having such unique, unforgettable experiences (like performing at Carnegie Hall and taking part in an off Broadway musical) in such a short period of time. Inspiring teachers and a variety of 'beyond classroom' activities and field trips not only have amazingly contributed for integration but also to keep the global perspective live in the day to day agenda. It was an amazing first year for our family in NYC and we owe it to Dwight!
